pkgmetadata.longdescription: Some Additional Multiple Imputation Functions, Especially for 'mice' // Contains some auxiliary functions for multiple imputation which complements existing functionality in R. In addition to some utility functions, main features include plausible value imputation, multilevel imputation functions (arbitrary number of levels, hierarchical and non-hierarchical datasets), imputation using partial least squares (PLS) for high dimensional predictors, and nested multiple imputation.
